Talk2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm just about finished inspecting the
repaired bridge. <sp:5:0:0>I'd be done by now if it
wasn't for this rain.
Talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for helping to keep our food
supplies intact. I'll deliver them to the
village as soon as I've packed them up.
Talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Hey. I owe you for opening up that cave
the last time we met.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks to you, all the food I collected
made it back to the village. They needed
it too!<sp:0:4:0>I wish I could say everything is fine now
that the snow has stopped...<sp:5:0:0>but I need to
check for any damage to the bridges.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>The last thing we want is any more
bridges collapsing.
Talk014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wish I could say everything is fine now
that the snow has stopped...<sp:5:0:0>but I need to
check for any damage to the bridges.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>The last thing we want is any more
bridges collapsing.
Talk015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>From my initial inspection, none of the
other bridges look too seriously damaged.<sp:0:4:0>But it couldn't hurt to inspect them again
just to be sure.
Talk016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's cold outside the cave. Keep yourself
warm, OK?
Talk017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm relieved that the snow has stopped
and the bridge is repaired.<sp:0:4:0>I went around checking the other bridges
too, and none of the rest seemed to have
been damaged by the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>With the bridge inspections behind me,
I can go back to guarding the village.
Talk018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I went around checking the other bridges
too, and none of the rest seemed to have
been damaged by the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0>With the bridge inspections behind me,
I can go back to guarding the village.
Talk019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Hey, I owe you one for helping open up
that cave.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks to you, all the food I collected
made it back to the village. They needed
it too!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm relieved that the snow has stopped
and the bridge is repaired.<sp:0:4:0>I went around checking the other bridges,
too, and none of the rest seemed to have
been damaged by the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>With the bridge inspections behind me,
I can go back to guarding the village.
Talk2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I was in the middle of inspecting the
bridges, but I'll have to get back to it
after the rain stops. <sp:5:0:0>Guess it's break time.
Talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>We're lucky the cave-in didn't extend
farther inside.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Also that the food I collected is still intact.
I need to pack it up and hurry it over to
the village.
